description.displayText: Ruth is 100% the best person to watch your children! She started with our baby when she was 6 months old and my whole family immediately fell in love with her. Our daughter absolutely ADORES her! She is so experienced, so responsible and so reliable. Sometimes, I trust Ruth more with the baby than I do myself! :) She's easygoing which is great for us but disciplined which is great for our daughter. We appreciate the fact that she's willing to find fun, creative things to do with her as well. We are so blessed to have found Ruth and she's like family now. She'll definitely always be a part of our lives whether she is watching our daughter or not. I would just encourage anyone out there looking to hire her if you get the chance before someone else does! She's irreplaceable!

description.displayText: Ruth is 100% the greatest nanny anyone could ask for. She started watching our baby when she was 6 months old and we've been so extremely comfortable with her from day 1. I almost trust her more with the baby than I do myself! :) She's got the best attitude and spirit and is so responsible and dependable. She is so comfortable, natural and amazing with children and I feel so blessed to have found her. She's like family now and we hope to always keep her in our baby's life in whatever capacity we can!
description.originalText: Ruth is 100% the greatest nanny anyone could ask for. She started watching our baby when she was 6 months old and we've been so extremely comfortable with her from day 1. I almost trust her more with the baby than I do myself! :) She's got the best attitude and spirit and is so responsible and dependable. She is so comfortable, natural and amazing with children and I feel so blessed to have found her. She's like family now and we hope to always keep her in our baby's life in whatever capacity we can!

description.displayText: Wow, what can I say!  We are incredibly lucky to have Ruth.  Unfortunately another lucky family scooped her up before we had a chance.  We have her one day a week and I can't tell how wonderful she is with my very energetic little girl. She took the time to look up things to do in our area to keep my daughter engaged.  I am a flight attendant and every time I had to leave home, my daughter would melt down. Now she can't get me out fast enough!  It is so nice to know my daughter is in good hands.  Ruth is a genuine, smart, intuitive, lovely young woman.  We are so lucky to have her!

description.displayText: Thank you Ruth with letting me know about your availability.
description.originalText: Thank you Ruth with letting me know about your availability.

description.displayText: I was hesitant at first to have a non-family caregiver for my two young children (ages 1 and 2), but Ruth has been the most dependable, reliable, responsible sitter I could have asked for. She has excellent values and a strong Christian background; I don't worry about anything when she is watching the kids. I feel completely comfortable and at-ease with her being with the children for several hours while I am away. She is always on time, willing to come over at short notice and has a flexible schedule. The kids enjoy her company and talk about her after she has left. Ruth is very sweet with the kids, but has a responsible and in-charge tone as well. It is rare to find a sitter as responsible and with such good character. We will miss her dearly!

description.displayText: Atlanta is gaining a great care giver!  I can't tell you how great Ruth has been for our Family.  She was never unavailable.  My little boy adored her and ask for her to come over even if she wasn't needed.  We consider Ruth a friend, no longer just a care giver.  We highly recomend Ruth!
